mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(item.`count`) AS totalCount, SUM(item.`amount`) AS totalAmount, SUM(item.`tax_amount`) AS totalTaxAmount

SELECT sales.`id` AS id, sales.client_id AS clientId, client.`name` AS clientName, sales.sales_person AS salesPerson, salesUser.`name` AS salesPersonName, sales.`sales_person_dept` AS salesPersonDept, salesUserDept.`name` AS salesPersonDeptName, sales.`contract_code` AS `contractCode`, sales.`contract_type` AS contractType, dict.`name` AS contractTypeName, sales.contract_date AS contractDate, sales.contract_expire_date AS contractExpireDate, sales.discount_rate AS discountRate, sales.discount_amount AS discountAmount, sales.pay_amount AS payAmount, sales.invoiced_amount AS invoicedAmount, sales.uninvoiced_amount AS uninvoicedAmount, sales.create_by AS createBy, createUser.name AS createByName, sales.create_time AS createTime, sales.auditor AS auditor, auditUser.`name` AS auditorName, sales.`audit_time` AS auditTime, IF(sales.close_status=0,'未关闭','关闭') AS closeStatusName, sales.audit_sign AS auditSign, dica.`name` AS auditSignName FROM scm_salescontract sales LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dict ON dict.id = sales.contract_type LEFT JOIN cus_client client ON client.id = sales.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user salesUser ON salesUser.user_id = sales.sales_person LEFT JOIN sys_dept salesUserDept ON salesUserDept.dept_id = sales.sales_person_dept LEFT JOIN sys_user createUser ON createUser.user_id = sales.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user auditUser ON auditUser.user_id = sales.auditor LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dica ON dica.id = sales.audit_sign WHERE sales.id = #{value}
